column2: You are a wizard descending into an ancient underground city of magic.
Beneath its depths lies the Mistress' Staff, an artifact of untold power.
Will you prevail against forces unknown, or succumb to its dark secrets?
Today the dungeon claims another helpless girl.
Bound and exhausted, you cannot hope to continue.
Perhaps you may come to enjoy your new life.
You have reached the end of the playable portion.
Come back later for new dungeons!
You pause and regain some breath
Press a key, then press a button to set that key
You climb down the stairs. The passage closes behind you.
You search through the debris but find nothing of note
You find some gold coins in a corner (+XXX gold)
You find a lockpick in a crack between the tiles
You find a rusty knife among the rocks
You find a red key, covered in grime
You find a green key with an ornate handle
You find a blue key, glowing with magic
You find a magic scroll, which you place in your spellbook. (+SpellLearned)
You find gold and a magic trap! (+RestraintType) (+XXX gold)
The EnemyName grabs you by the harness and keeps you in place!
The zombie moans and collapses to the ground.
The zombie's charms attach to your body (+RestraintAdded)
The zombie caresses your body! (-DamageTaken WP)
The zombie screeches and tumbles to the floor.
The zombie viciously wraps you in charms (+RestraintAdded)
The zombie gropes your body! (-DamageTaken WP)
The magic rope returns to being a normal rope.
The magic rope wraps itself tightly around your body! (+RestraintAdded)
The magic rope wriggles into your outfit! (-DamageTaken WP)
The shock witch vanishes into a cloud of thunder, leaving behind a keyring.
The chain witch vanishes into a pile of metal dust, leaving behind a keyring.
The chain witch locks all of your restraints!
The chain witch tugs sensually at your restraints!
The rat skitters back into a hole in the wall.
The filthy rat nibbles at you! (-DamageTaken WP)
You do not have enough stamina to cast the spell!
You attack the TargetEnemy for DamageDealt damage!
AttackName hits the TargetEnemy for DamageDealt damage!
You tug on the TargetRestraint but fail to make progress.
You try to unlock the TargetRestraint but can't reach the lock.
You try to unlock the TargetRestraint but break your lockpick.
You work on picking the TargetRestraint.
You break your lockpick trying to open the TargetRestraint.
You try to undo the TargetRestraint but can't reach far enough.
You try to cut the TargetRestraint but can't get through the material.
You break your knife trying to cut the TargetRestraint.
You try to unlock the TargetRestraint but you can't reach the lock!
The red padlock only accepts red keys.
The green padlock only accepts green keys.
The yellow padlock requires a red and a green key.
The magical lock only accepts blue keys.
You don't have a key for this lock.
The key sticks in the lock and jams!
You manage to squeeze out of the TargetRestraint!
You pick the lock on the TargetRestraint!
You pick the lock on the TargetRestraint!
You unfasten the TargetRestraint and get it off your body!
You do not have enough for a proper offering.
The goddess removes some of your restraints!
The goddess restores your mental and physical state!
Glowing runes on the altar teach you how to cast SpellLearned.
You found a shrine to the goddess of TYPE
You climb down to the next level
You picked up a red key.
You picked up a green key.
You picked up a blue key.
The incantation comes out as a garbled mess!
You can't raise your arms to cast the spell!
Your feet are too clumsy to perform the magic gesture!
A slow moving ball of flame that does DamageDealt damage
A quick shard of ice that does DamageDealt damage and stuns for Duration turns.
You a hurl a shard of ice!
Throws a chain that stuns enemies for a turn.
You a hurl a strand of chain!
A delayed shock that deals DamageDealt damage and stuns for Duration turns.
You charge up a burst of electricty!
A slow moving ball of flame that explodes for DamageDealt damage
An invisible circle on the grounds that binds anyone who walks on it for Duration turns
Select where to put the trap (it will be invisible)
A flash of light which renders anyone caught within blind for Duration turns
You charge up a bright flash!
Select where to center the flash (SpellArea radius)
A massive flash of light which renders anyone caught within blind for Duration turns
You charge up a bright flash!
Select where to center the flash (SpellArea radius)
Select where to center the flash (SpellArea radius)
A focused flash of light which renders anyone caught within blind for Duration turns
You slowly charge up a powerful flash!
A huge pool of slime will slow enemies that step inside.
You throw a ball of slime!
Select where the slime will start (SpellArea radius)
You blinded yourself with your own magic!
Your own rope trap springs upon you!
You get caught in sticky slime!
You feel a powerful sensation run through your body!
A magic chain secures itself around your body!
A magic rope wraps itself around your body!
The spell hits you and slows you down!
